text: Donse don lɔxɔne na yi dangu, Yuba yi a diine xilima nɛn alogo a xa e rasariɲan. A yi kelima nɛn xɔtɔn, a yi saraxa gan daxin ba e birin xa, amasɔtɔ Yuba yi mirixi a ma fa fala, “Waxatina nde, n ma diine bata yulubin tongo, e fala ɲaxin ti Ala ma e bɔɲɛni.” Yuba yi na nan ligama waxatin birin.
